title: Resize logo and apply circular styling

requirements.summary: Replace current logo image with uploaded circular logo in all sizes
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded circular logo replaces existing logo assets
Logo maintains circular appearance across all placements

file_operations.description: Update favicon link references to use the generated circular logo assets: frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-32x32.dim_32x32.png for 32x32 favicon, frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-16x16.dim_16x16.png for 16x16 favicon, and frontend/public/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png for Apple touch icon. Replace existing favicon paths with these exact workspace file paths.

requirements.summary: Adjust logo size in Header component and ensure circular styling with CSS
acceptanceCriteria: Logo size is visually balanced in the header
Circular shape is maintained with CSS styling
Logo displays correctly on mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Update the logo image source to use the generated header logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-header.dim_64x64.png. Add or update CSS classes to ensure the logo has rounded-full (or equivalent border-radius: 50%) styling to maintain circular appearance. Adjust the image dimensions (width/height attributes or Tailwind classes) to achieve appropriate scaling for header display, ensuring visibility on both mobile and desktop viewports.
